data.text: @cnnphilippines @pplmanuel This is reasonable because of all the infrastructures made by PRRD plus the resources spent to fight Covid19. It is incomparable to the 6B debt that PNoy left we 0 achievements made and only his inner circle pocketing a big slice of the pie.
@cnnphilippines @pplmanuel No need to pay, not our fault anyway
@cnnphilippines @pplmanuel Ang galing ng ano... Yung ipapanganak pa lang na mga sanggol...may P12 trillion na utang agad! MAGALENG!!!  #DU30LEGACY
